titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to a popish pamphlet, of late newly forbished, and the second time printed, entituled: Certaine articles, or forcible reasons discouering the palpable absurdities, and most notorious errors of the Protestants religion. By Anthony Wotton
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Anthony, 1561?-1626.

titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to a popish pamphlet, of late newly forbished, and the second time printed, entituled: Certaine articles, or forcible reasons discouering the palpable absurdities, and most notorious errors of the Protestants religion. By Anthony Wotton
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Anthony, 1561?-1626.
Wright, Thomas, d. 1624. Certaine articles or forcible reasons.

publicationStmt.publisher: By G. Eld, for William Timme, dwelling in Pater-noster rowe, at the signe of the Flower de Luce and Crovvne, necre [sic] Cheapeside,

notesStmt.note: A reprinting of and reply to the work by Thomas Wright.
Running title reads: An answer to the late popish articles.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Some print stained and creased; some print show-through. Pages 70-95 from Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy spliced at end.
